languages.text: "Благородн{mf|ый лорд|ая леди}, позвольте минуту вашего внимания! Я — Бастьян ин Дерама Бастаал-Чорда, младший кузен династии Чорда, представитель Инцендии Бастаал-Чорда, милостью святейшего {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} Простора Коронус. А вы, должно быть, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}представитель{/d} Теодоры фон Валанциус? Я заметил, что вы прибыли на корабле многоуважаемой госпожи".

"Noble {mf|sir|lady}, a minute of your time, if you please! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. And you must be an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}envoy{/d} of Theodora von Valancius? I noticed that you arrived on the esteemed lady's ship."
languages.original_text: "Благородн{mf|ый лорд|ая леди}, позвольте минуту вашего внимания! Я — Бастьян ин Дерама Бастаал-Чорда, младший кузен династии Чорда, представитель Инцендии Бастаал-Чорда, милостью святейшего {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} Простора Коронус. А вы, должно быть, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}представитель{/d} Теодоры фон Валанциус? Я заметил, что вы прибыли на корабле многоуважаемой госпожи".

traits.locale_text: "Noble {mf|sir|lady}, a minute of your time, if you please! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of the Chorda dynasty, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy Emperor. And you must be an envoy of Theodora von Valancius? I've noticed that you've arrived on the esteemed Lady Theodora's ship."

"Noble {mf|sir|lady}, a minute of your time, if you please! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of the Chorda dynasty, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy Emperor. And you must be an envoy of Theodora von Valancius? I've noticed that you've arrived on the esteemed Lady Theodora's ship."

"Noble {mf|sir|lady}, a minute of your time, if you please! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy Emperor. And you must be an envoy of Theodora von Valancius? I noticed that you arrived on the esteemed lady's ship."

"Noble {mf|sir|lady}, a minute of your time, if you please! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy Emperor. And you must be an envoy of Theodora von Valancius? I noticed that you arrived on the esteemed lady's ship."

"Noble {mf|sir|lady}, a minute of your time, if you please! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. And you must be an envoy of Theodora von Valancius? I noticed that you arrived on the esteemed lady's ship."

languages.text: 「高貴な{mf|御方|ご婦人}、しばしお時間をちょうだいしてもよろしいでしょうか！私はチョーダ家の末の親族、インセンディア・バスタール・チョーダの使者、神聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の恩寵を受けてコロヌス・エクスパンスの{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}に任命されましたデラマ＝バスタール・チョーダのバスティアンと申します。あなたはシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス様の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}使者{/d}であるとお察しします。かの偉大なご婦人の船で到着されるところを拝見しました」
languages.original_text: "Noble {mf|sir|lady}, a minute of your time, if you please! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. And you must be an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}envoy{/d} of Theodora von Valancius? I noticed that you arrived on the esteemed lady's ship."

traits.locale_text: 「高貴な{mf|御方|ご婦人}、しばしお時間をちょうだいしてもよろしいでしょうか！私はチョーダ家の末の親族、インセンディア・バスタール・チョーダの使者、神聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の恩寵を受けてコロヌス・エクスパンスの{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}に任命されましたデラマ＝バスタール・チョーダのバスティアンと申します。あなたはシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス様の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}使者{/d}であるとお察しします。かの偉大なご婦人の船で到着されるところを拝見しました」

languages.text: “尊贵的{mf|先生|女士}，请允许我占用你一分钟时间！我是德拉玛的巴斯蒂安·巴斯塔·库尔达，库尔达家族的表亲。我的主人是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}在科罗努斯扩区任命的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，因森蒂娅·巴斯塔·库尔达，而我是她的特使。您一定是西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}特使{/d}吧？我注意到，您是乘坐那位尊贵大人的船来的。”
languages.original_text: "Noble {mf|sir|lady}, a minute of your time, if you please! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. And you must be an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}envoy{/d} of Theodora von Valancius? I noticed that you arrived on the esteemed lady's ship."

traits.locale_text: “尊贵的{mf|先生|女士}，请允许我占用你一分钟时间！我是德拉玛的巴斯蒂安·巴斯塔·库尔达，库尔达家族的表亲。我的主人是{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}在扩区任命的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，因森蒂娅·巴斯塔·库尔达，而我是她的特使。您一定是西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的特使吧？我注意到，您是乘坐那位尊贵大人的船来的。”

languages.text: «Mi noble {mf|señor|señora}, ¡permítame robarle un minuto! Me llamo Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, el primo más joven de la casa Chorda y legado de Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de la Extensión de Koronus por gracia del santísimo {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}. ¿A usted {mf|le|la} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}envía{/d} Theodora von Valancius? He reparado en que viene en la nave de la excelentísima».
languages.original_text: "Noble {mf|sir|lady}, a minute of your time, if you please! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. And you must be an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}envoy{/d} of Theodora von Valancius? I noticed that you arrived on the esteemed lady's ship."

traits.locale_text: «Mi noble {mf|señor|señora}, ¡permítame robarle un minuto! Me llamo Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, el primo más joven de la casa Chorda y legado de Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de la Extensión de Koronus por gracia del santísimo {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}. ¿A usted {mf|le|la} envía Theodora von Valancius? He reparado en que viene con la nave de la excelentísima».

languages.text: « Noble {mf|sire|dame}, auriez-vous un instant à me consacrer ? Je suis Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, benjamin des cousins de la maison Chorda, émissaire d'Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} des Étendues de Koronus par la grâce du très saint {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. Vous devez être l'{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}émissaire{/d} de Théodora von Valancius ? Je vous ai {mf|vu|vue} débarquer de son vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "Noble {mf|sir|lady}, a minute of your time, if you please! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. And you must be an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}envoy{/d} of Theodora von Valancius? I noticed that you arrived on the esteemed lady's ship."

traits.locale_text: « Noble {mf|sire|dame}, auriez-vous un instant à me consacrer ? Je suis Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, benjamin des cousins de la maison Chorda, émissaire d'Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} des Étendues de Koronus par la grâce du très saint {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. Vous devez être l'émissaire de Théodora von Valancius ? Je vous ai {mf|vu|vue} débarquer de son vaisseau. »

languages.text: "{mf|Edler Sir|Edle Madam}, könntet Ihr bitte eine Minute Eurer Zeit erübrigen? Ich bin Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, jüngster Vetter des Hauses Chorda, Gesandter von Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} der Koronus-Ausdehnung durch die Gnade des heiligsten {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}. Und Ihr seid bestimmt {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}{mf|ein Gesandter|eine Gesandte}{/d} von Theodora von Valancius? Ich habe bemerkt, dass Ihr mit dem Schiff der geschätzten Lady eingetroffen seid."
languages.original_text: "Noble {mf|sir|lady}, a minute of your time, if you please! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. And you must be an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}envoy{/d} of Theodora von Valancius? I noticed that you arrived on the esteemed lady's ship."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Edler Sir|Edle Madam}, könntet Ihr bitte eine Minute Eurer Zeit erübrigen? Ich bin Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, jüngster Vetter des Hauses Chorda, Gesandter von Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} der Koronus-Ausdehnung durch die Gnade des heiligsten {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}. Und Ihr seid bestimmt {mf|ein Gesandter|eine Gesandte} von Theodora von Valancius? Ich habe bemerkt, dass Ihr mit dem Schiff der geschätzten Lady eingetroffen seid."

languages.text: "Soylu {mf|beyim|hanımım}, bir dakikanızı almamın sakıncası var mı? Bendeniz Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda. Chorda Hanesi'nin en genç ferdi ve kutsal efendimiz {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} Hazretleri'nin lütfuyla Koronus Enginliği'nin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'i{/g} mertebesine erişen İncendia Bastaal-Chorda'nın elçisiyim. Siz de Leydi Theodora von Valancius'un {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}elçisi{/d} olmalısınız. Saygıdeğer Leydi Hazretleri'nin gemisiyle teşrif ettiğinizi fark ettim."
languages.original_text: "Noble {mf|sir|lady}, a minute of your time, if you please! I am Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, youngest cousin of House Chorda, envoy of Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of the Koronus Expanse by the grace of the most holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. And you must be an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallIncognito}envoy{/d} of Theodora von Valancius? I noticed that you arrived on the esteemed lady's ship."

traits.locale_text: "Soylu {mf|beyim|hanımım}, bir dakikanızı almamın sakıncası var mı? Bendeniz Bastian in Derama Bastaal-Chorda, Chorda Hanesi'nin en genç kuzeni ve kutsal efendimiz, yüce {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un lütfuyla Koronus Enginliği'nin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'i olan Incendia Bastaal-Chorda'nın elçisiyim. Siz de Leydi Theodora von Valancius'un elçisi olmalısınız, buraya saygıdeğer Leydi Hazretleri'nin gemisiyle teşrif ettiğinizi fark ettim."
